name: Lost Litter Playtest Demo
description:
LOST LITTER

Game is currently in development.
School project, themed "casual mobile game".

At this point we`re looking some playtesters to give us feedback and improvement ideas for our game. Each feedback is highly appreciated! This gameplay demo contains 12 levels from 2 different environments.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press your device screen to create bridge between the platforms. Longer you press, longer the bridge will be. Too short bridge and it won`t connect, too long and dear mama fox falls over the platform!

Known bugs:

Animations need polishing

Certain length bridges can get stuck

Game freezes after the last level is finished

Feedback form: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=lNlZWzIQvE-HBTZUTG4O2y2kB10N...
